segments.text: You got our email with all the specifications for the project . We'll be accepting bids untill noon on Tuesday . If you have any questions between now and then , please let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I did have a question . We'd like to know what you had in mind for the budget on this project . We are hoping to put together a really competitive bid . But at the same time , we'd like to hit your target price , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . But unfortunately , it is our policy not to disclose our bottom line . You can be assured that price is a weighty consideration when we review the proposals . We also consider other elements , including design and practicality . We also give weight to the reputation of the submitting company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any price range ? Is there any way you can give me any idea of what direction to go or how high is too high ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're just looking for a reasonable price according to the specifications in our project blueprint . That's all I can say .
segments.speaker: S1
